channel.title: Slate's Table to Farm
channel.description: Table to Farm, featuring Slate's L.V. Anderson and The Sporkful's Dan Pashman, reverse engineers the food chain, exploring the origins of what we buy, cook, and eat.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A deeper look at the origins of the things we eat
channel.itunes:author: Slate Magazine
channel.itunes:summary: Table to Farm, featuring Slate's L.V. Anderson and The Sporkful's Dan Pashman, reverse engineers the food chain, exploring the origins of what we buy, cook, and eat.
channel.content:encoded: Table to Farm, featuring Slate's L.V. Anderson and The Sporkful's Dan Pashman, reverse engineers the food chain, exploring the origins of what we buy, cook, and eat.

item.title: Slate's Table to Farm #1: Seared Scallops Edition
item.description: This new series, featuring Slate's L.V. Anderson and The Sporkful's Dan Pashman, reverse engineers the food chain, exploring the origins of what we buy, cook, and eat. In this episode Laura and Dan talk to a commercial fisherman, a shellfish farmer, and the organizer of a community supported fishery (CSF), then cook up some seared sea scallops.
